tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Roma Haider is one of the most competent, knowledgeable, and compassionate doctors. She is wonderful at her work and is always available for her patients, be it before or after the appointment. Dr. Haider takes out time and explains every minute detail which is very helpful for her patients. She treats her patients like her own family and we are all blessed to have her as our doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very Professional.Got my orthodontic treatment done by Dr.Salim sir and it was a wonderful experience without experiencing any pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Salim and Dr. Roma deliver exceptional dental care. Their expertise, combined with their warmth and professionalism, create a comforting atmosphere for patients. With their compassionate approach and extensive experience, they provide top-notch service, ensuring each visit is pleasant and effective. Highly recommended dental professionals!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Exceptional Dental Care: Dr. Salim's Professionalism Shines Bright

I recently underwent a wisdom tooth removal procedure performed by Dr. Salim, and I cannot speak highly enough of the exceptional care and professionalism I experienced throughout the entire process. From the moment I entered his office, I was greeted with warmth and compassion, which immediately put me at ease despite my apprehensions about the procedure.

Dr. Salim's expertise was evident from the start. He took the time to thoroughly explain the procedure to me, addressing any concerns or questions I had with patience and clarity. His confidence and competence reassured me that I was in good hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would definitely recommend Dr. Salim and Dr. Roma for their utmost care. They made me feel so comfortable and ensure that I have safe treatment at the clinic and during OT procedure. The OT procedure for removing cyst/tumor was unbelievable. If any of you are looking for any dental advice, you can consult with Dr. Roma and Dr. Salim as they both sit in the Apollo Spectra Koramangala.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had multiple tooth problems and was looking for a good dentist.  Luckily I went to the right place , ********* ********* ** ** **** ****** *** ** ***** **********, they explained all the issues and came up with a well planned schedule and started the treatment that was reasonably priced with highest quality treatment  .Dr Salim and Dr Roma are highly experienced and skilled .They  have all the latest equipments in their clinic .  They take utmost care to ensure the best treatment  and try to complete the treatment in lesser sittings by extending beyond their working hours, they fixed the minor issues by filling and suggested root canal treatment  only when it was required.They explained all the steps and procedures completely before starting  the treatment.  Crown that was added exactly matches my tooth color  , no one can make out that its not natural tooth  they had used the latest cutting edge technologies to ensure that the crown fits properly. They have fixed all my tooth issues .Thanks a lot Dr Roma and Dr Salim . I highly recommend their clinic to everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Salim and Dr. Roma both are highly experienced and skilled doctors. They explained all the procedure very well. They are always accomodative on their schedule. Their clinic is also very higyinic. I will recommend them for any of your dental problem

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Roma and her husband were a gift from God to me. I was extremely blessed to stumble into this lovely couple.Highly professional and kind hearted. You feel so at home. She and her husband are gentle and informative. They made sure I understood everything I was going to undertake. I had a major surgery without even realizing how complicated the situation was. Few days after the surgery, I recovered almost completely. I faced no complications. When I needed help with anything, they were very quick to reply. They prioritize the safety and comfort of the patient so much. I don't think I'll ever opt for another doctor as long as I am in India.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a problem of recession and crowder teeth and the canine milk teeth behind which there was my permanent original canine,which i got it removed by undergoing surgery in a small dental clinic I wouldn't like to name. The removal caused residue and a cyst near that area which could not be diagnosed by my old dental clinic.Months later(nearly 6) i visited Apollo spectra,Dr.Roma first took me for consultation and ordered a CBCT scan in which they diagnosed the cyst and did cyst enuealation(removal) . Dr.Salim is currently taking care of my orthodontic treatment. My sister took her retainers from here .They treat you with utmost care and if you have any doubts just text them and they will respond for sure on your problem. I suggest anyone having dental problems to visit dr.Roma and dr.salim and not worry nor hesitate. once you go there the problem will be solved in your head, physically they will take care. I am glad to have found them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Going for dental appointment in general is a bit scary; the chair, the instruments and the noise that the machines make scares you.  I had four teeth that needed to be extracted and a couple of fillings.  Believe me, the couple, Dr. Salim and Dr.  Roma made me so comfortable throughout the procedure.  The extraction of tooth was done with utmost  dexterity and under continuous monitoring.  They worked beyond their working hours on that day and left hospital after making sure that I am accompanied by my family.  They are not only meticulous professionals but very philonthrophic and humanitarian.   You feel safe in their hands.  I highly recommend these doctors who make every effort to give utmost satisfaction to their patients and they are very, very patient and empathetic.  Before going forward with any procedure, they will give all the options available  to the patient and the pros and cons are discussed and then conclusions are made with patient's consent.  Amazing doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Met Dr.Salim and Dr.Roma for daughter’s Orthodontic tooth alignment treatment. Every step was meticulously planned starting from photography session till placement of retainer, which is the last step.

Later consulted for my Root canal treatment and fixing of cap.

Highlight of our experience is you can feel free to ask any question and rest assured, they will be answered diligently. They are available on call for any emergencies. They go above and beyond their call of duty.

I can say Dr.Salim and Dr.Roma are Doctors par excellence not only in Dental technical excellence but also for being kind, compassionate and humane nature. We are fortunate to have met them at the right time.  We wish them all the very best in all their future endeavours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
My family has been their patients since May 2021. I had first taken our house help to them for treatment for her RCT. Even though she comes from a lower socio-economic background, both Dr Salim and Dr Roma treated her very well. 

Based on this experience, I recommended my mother for a dental treatment and she was also delighted with the thoughtfulness of Dr Salim and Dr Roma in attending to her. My mother rarely praises any doctor but for Drs Salim and Roma, she only gives her blessings! 

Definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Implant Retained Dentures,
review:
Dr. Salim Shamsuddin and Dr. Roma Haider are wonderful, and I have been consulting them for myself, my mother, and my son.

They prepared a detailed road map to address all my dental problems and explained to me in detail the approach taken for handling them.

They are reasonable with pricing and the facility is well maintained following all COVID sanitization protocols.
They understand and give me appointments as per my work and kids' schedules.
Very understanding and they always made me feel comfortable before starting the procedure.

I am glad that I found the right dentist for my family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Words are few to describe Dr. Roma Haider and Dr. Salim Shamsuddin. Never met Doctors like them. They have never given a feeling of being with a doctor. So down to earth, such caring attitude for every patient, follow ups, everything.

Never saw a doctor so punctual and humble that even for a 5 minutes delay, he/she personally tells the patients to allow few minutes.

The treatment, the procedures all are so beautifully managed. Even when am not in Bengaluru, I straight away take online consultation where possible, and the same is paid equal attention by them.

I wish both Dr. Roma and Dr. Salim All The Best and Good Luck. 😊😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
For a long time I have suffered dental issues and never found a DR. I could place my full faith in until I met DR.Roma and DR.Salim. From the first appointment I felt at home and heard, reassured and safe to proceed with the discussed treatment. From the initial stage of treatment to the process and aftermath, both DR. Roma and DR. Salim were friendly and encouraging and happy to explain the options available to me with expert advice. I truly appreciated the kind and supportive atmosphere they create and am finally able to look forward to a positive chapter in my own dental history.
Vicki and Avinash

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had visited Dr Salim Shamsuddin and Dr. Roma few months back for consulation in appollo spectra hospitals,koramangala. Initial analysis which was done by them in understanding my dental issues was really very good and they understood the problem and provided my the right guidance,solution and also fixed all my dental issues and now I am in much much better position as compared to before. Excellent job done by Dr Salim and Dr. Roma. I would like to really appreciate them for their quality of work and there expertise in understanding and solving the dental releated problems.

Thanks to you once again Dr.Salim and Dr. Roma. Wishing you great success in everything you do! Good luck!


Regards, 
Pradeep Raja
Senior Software Technology Specialist
(M.N.C, Bengaluru)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Right from childhood, I was very scared of going to the dentist.
When I had been to the hospital with my Mother Achamma, Dr. Roma Haider made me comfortable by first acknowledging and understanding my fear.  Dr. Roma Haider explained to me the treatment procedure and encouraged me to ask any questions. 
The treatment was painless. Post the treatment I was educated on the things I should do to make sure I keep dental hygiene.
Thanks a lot, Dr. Roma Haider. You have changed the way I used to look at Dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ******** ***** this was my first dental extraction, so I was pretty paranoid about the pain before the procedure, but Dr. Roma and Dr. Salim made me feel 100% comfortable and at home, and reassured me that it was going to be okay. The procedure was painless and seamless. We wrapped up pretty soon and clean for the magnitude of wear that my maxillary molar had undergone. A few things I'd like to highlight:1. it's very easy to be honest to them - they're supportive and not judgemental2. they're actually concerned about your health. I felt genuinely cared for (and loved).I think I've finally found myself trustworthy, solid family doctors.

*** **** ******* ****** ******** ********* ** **** * ***** ******** I m really worried to find a best dentist who will be very careful with the medical history of me and the operate for dental problm. No pain after any(major) work done. She knows what she doing and is fast! I stay in Tripura "Dharmanagar"which is soo far fm Bangalore. She is super friendly and I would strongly & highly recommend you coming here for any of yor dentist needs. I m thankful that we found the right dentist and everything went well. 
   Thanking you soo much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My journey alongside Dr. Salim and Dr. Roma has been nothing short of remarkable. They are brilliant doctors as well as empathetic individuals who deeply understand the emotional weight of dental struggles. Right from the beginning, their professionalism and sincere care made me feel like I was in the best hands possible.

I had severely misaligned teeth, so finding the right solution was crucial. Dr. Roma and Dr. Salim presented a solution that resonated perfectly with my needs. Their approach not only aligned my teeth but also ensured that my natural teeth were safeguarded. Their clear guidance and explanations eased my worries and made the process much smoother.
Throughout the procedures, their expertise and meticulous attention to detail were evident. What struck me most was the balance they maintained between their professionalism and empathy. They truly listened to my concerns, providing reassurance that made me feel valued and understood.

What truly sets Dr. Roma and Dr. Salim apart is their commitment to holistic well-being. They recognize the emotional aspects tied to dental issues and approached my case with genuine care. This unique blend of exceptional dental work and emotional support is truly a rarity.
I can't help but extend my heartfelt gratitude. Here's to their continued success and the positive impact they bring to people's lives!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful experience! Dr Roma and Dr Salim  were very insightful and extremely helpful in explaining the cause and treatment required. I recommend the doctors to anyone who has dental problems. The doctors have lot of experience and you can see that when they treat you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Roma and Dr. Saleem for multiple issues since feb. Be it my anxiety be it my dental or oral issues they both have been really really helpful. 

They go out of the way to help, infact doctor visited to just check even on a Sunday when they were on leave. 

The most important fact, they helped me quit smoking. I cannot thank them enough for the impact they have left in my life. 

May Allah give them everything they wished for.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got three wisdom teeth removed in one sitting. The procedure didn't hurt at all. I was very happy with the post-op support provided and doctor took great care in explaining everything to me so that I would have less pain. Doctor was also very prompt in replying to my queries. Overall, I am very satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had my teeth filling and Invisalign with Dr. Salim Shamsuddin and Dr. Roma Haider. They are well experienced dentist, They treat me well, explained my issues and the treatment was smooth. 

The follow ups are pretty good, they update the next date spot on and take care of us till the end of the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Roma & Dr.Salim, you both are just awesome. In a nutshell if I have to add, you both are gift to mankind. Thanks for everything that you do. I had multiple tooth issues, I am glad that you helped in me in all possible ways. 😍😍❤️❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had the experience of meeting with Dr Roma and Dr Salim during my Root Canal Treatment (RCT). They explained the entire process in details and provided support each step of the way. Their USP is their friendly and kind nature. They are expert in bringing smiles to many. They are very dedicated and the best dental doctors in the country.

tags: Value for money,
review:
Phenomenal experience given by Dr Roma & Dr Salim , husband and wife duo with over 50 years of collective experience in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia, repatriated to their home , BLR. 
2 Implants done ✔️ successfully and very reasonably priced , pain free. Other dentists had quoted almost double the cost. Phewwwww....
Highly recommended. 
God Bless & Regards 
SS 
***** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: No words can do justice to the excellence of Dr Salim Shamsuddin & Dr Roma Haider. Extremely professional & ethical, yet with a personal touch. Visited them for my 7 year old nephew for his cavity and fillings. They were so gentle with him. Have never seen a child enjoy visiting a dentist, all thanks to their humble and friendly behaviour. The treatment plan was thoroughly explained. This is not the first time have had the privilege to visit them, as they have been treating all members of my family since years. Would recommend these doctors 100%, who hold a wide range of services withs lots of versatile skills with extremely reasonable and affordable prices.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Roma is very good in keeping the patient calm about the procedure.  The explainations were so detailed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Roma Haider is the most conscientious dentist I’ve ever relied on. Her whole team are masters of service and make every visit a happy one.
